SELECT t.id, t.zc_bf_id zcbfid, t.status, t.fileName, t.fileUrl, t.identifyContent, t.identifyFileName, t.identifyFileUrl, t.bz, t.shb_status shbStatus, t.cwb_status cwbStatus, t.shUsername, t.shDeptname, t.cwUsername, t.cwDeptname, zb.bf_category category, u1.nickname uname, p3.deptname udeptname, c.zc_codenum zcCodenum, c.zc_name zcName, g.name categoryName, c.specification, c.model, c.unit, c.use_status, c.zc_from zcfrom, c.card_num cardNum, c.zcCategoryName, DATE_FORMAT(c.start_use_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s') startusetime, c.lave_time lavetime, c.original_value originalvalue, c.netvalue, c.id zcId, c.sy_dept_id syDeptId, c.gl_dept_id glDeptId, c.epcid, u.nickname, d1.deptname sydeptname, d2.deptname gldeptname, c.store_address storeaddress, c.inspect_time inspecttime, c.warrantyperiod FROM zc_bf_item t left join zc_bf zb on zb.id = t.zc_bf_id LEFT JOIN v_zc_info c ON t.zc_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_dept d1 ON c.sy_dept_id = d1.id LEFT JOIN t_dept d2 ON c.gl_dept_id = d2.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN zc_category g ON c.zc_category_id = g.id left join sys_user u1 on t.apply_user_id = u1.id left join t_dept p3 on u1.deptid = p3.id
t.zc_bf_id = #{zcBfId}

SELECT t.id, t.status, t.flow_todo_id flowTodoId, t.flow_item_id flowItemId, t.auditby, t.sendby, p.zc_bf_id zcbfid, p.bz, p.shb_status shbStatus, p.cwb_status cwbStatus, p.status itemStatus, p.fileName, p.fileUrl, p.identifyContent, p.identifyFileName, p.identifyFileUrl, p.damagedFileName, p.damagedFileUrl, p.del, c.zc_codenum zcCodenum, c.zc_name zcName, g.name categoryName, c.specification, c.model, c.epcid, c.unit, c.use_status, DATE_FORMAT(c.start_use_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s') startusetime, c.remainingperiod, c.original_value originalvalue, c.netvalue, u.nickname, d1.deptname sydeptname, d2.deptname gldeptname, c.store_address storeaddress, c.inspect_time inspecttime, c.warrantyperiod FROM flow_todo_item t LEFT JOIN zc_bf_item p ON t.flow_item_id = p.id LEFT JOIN zc_info c ON p.zc_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_dept d1 ON c.sy_dept_id = d1.id LEFT JOIN t_dept d2 ON c.gl_dept_id = d2.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN zc_category g ON c.zc_category_id = g.id
t.flow_todo_id = #{todoId}
